member.name: M:BackEnd_zadatak.Controllers.DevicesController.CreateOrUpdateDevice(BackEnd_zadatak.Dtos.DeviceForCreationOrUpdate)
member.summary: Creates or updates device and its properties depending on the presence of id
member.param: when creating device, set id field of device and its properties to null, or delete them but don't forget to provide appropriate ids when update

member.name: M:BackEnd_zadatak.Controllers.DevicesController.GetDevice(System.Int32)
member.summary: Retrieves the device by its Id.
member.param: the id of the device we want to return

member.name: M:BackEnd_zadatak.Controllers.DevicesController.DeleteDevice(System.Int32)
member.summary: Deletes the device by its Id
member.param: the id of the device we want to delete

member.name: M:BackEnd_zadatak.Controllers.DevicesController.GetDevicesByCriteria(BackEnd_zadatak.Helpers.DeviceParams)
member.summary: Returns devices based on specified criteria

member.name: M:BackEnd_zadatak.Controllers.DeviceTypesController.CreateOrUpdateDeviceType(BackEnd_zadatak.Dtos.DeviceTypeToCreateOrUpdate)
member.summary: Creates or updates device type and its properties depending on the presence of id
member.param: when creating device type, set id field of device type and its properties to null, or delete them but don't forget to provide appropriate ids when update

member.name: M:BackEnd_zadatak.Controllers.DeviceTypesController.DeleteDeviceType(System.Int32)
member.summary: Deletes the device type by its Id.
member.param: the id of the device type we want to delete

member.name: M:BackEnd_zadatak.Controllers.DeviceTypesController.GetDeviceType(System.Int32)
member.summary: Retrieves the device type by its Id.
member.param: the id of the device type we want to return
member.returns: returns device type with its properties
